title: Watch Face Android - Halloween
summary: The application is watch face for Smart Watch of "Android Wear."
description: ** The application is watch face for Smart Watch of "Android Wear" not "Galaxy Gear"What's New Watch Faces!Enjoy a variety of watch faces for Smart Watch of Android Wear.You can create various watches using the Watch Styler for Android Wear.(Only Android Wear. It's not supported Galaxy Gear of Tizen.)Application includes 3 pieces of Watch faces.If you download and install the theme application, You can find the theme from Watch Styler for Android Wear.You can create various watches using Watch Styler for Android Wear.Watch Styler for Android Wear download Guide- Please download Watch Styler for Android Wear.  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kr.co.omnicns.android.appcessory.watchstyle
descriptionHTML:
** The application is watch face for Smart Watch of "Android Wear" not "Galaxy Gear"

What's New Watch Faces!
Enjoy a variety of watch faces for Smart Watch of Android Wear.
You can create various watches using the Watch Styler for Android Wear.
(Only Android Wear. It's not supported Galaxy Gear of Tizen.)


Application includes 3 pieces of Watch faces.
If you download and install the theme application, You can find the theme from Watch Styler for Android Wear.
You can create various watches using Watch Styler for Android Wear.


Watch Styler for Android Wear download Guide
- Please download Watch Styler for Android Wear.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kr.co.omnicns.android.appcessory.watchstyle
comments: Doesn't work Purchased and installed. Won't show up in android wear. Just wasted my money. I want my money back..
Where is it?? Same here installed doesn't show in the installer.
